mapper.select: select datepart(month,OutDate) as month,AccountName accountName,CompanyName as companyName,sum(AllPrice) as substitutionPrice from Income a join OrderDetailed b on a.Id = b.OrderId where datepart(year,OutDate) = #{year} and datepart(month,OutDate) = #{month} and CompanyName like #{_companyName} and b.PayType = 2 group by All AccountName,datepart(year,OutDate),CompanyName,datepart(month,OutDate)

select GuideName as guideName,datepart(month,OutDate) as month,sum(SubstitutionPrice) as substitutionPrice from Income where datepart(year,OutDate)=#{year} and datepart(month,OutDate)=#{month} and GuideName like #{_guideName} group by all guideName,datepart(month,OutDate),datepart(month,OutDate),datepart(month,OutDate)

select datepart(month,OutDate) as month,AccountName accountName,CompanyName as companyName,sum(AllPrice) as substitutionPrice b.IsPayment as isPayment from Income a join OrderDetailed b on a.Id = b.OrderId where datepart(year,OutDate) = #{year} and datepart(month,OutDate) = #{month} and CompanyName like #{_companyName} and b.PayType = 1 group by All AccountName,datepart(year,OutDate),CompanyName,datepart(month,OutDate)

select datepart(month,a.OutDate) as month,a.AccountName as accountName,a.CompanyName as companyName, sum(b.SettlementPrice) as settlementPrice,sum(b.SubstitutionPrice) as substitutionPrice, sum(b.SettlementPrice)-sum(b.SubstitutionPrice) as count from Orders a join Income b on a.GuideName = b.GuideName where datepart(year,a.OutDate)=#{year} and datepart(month,a.OutDate)=#{month} and CompanyName like #{_companyName} group by all a.AccountName,a.CompanyName,datepart(year,a.OutDate),datepart(month,a.OutDate)
